title: Wrong Turn
description: If you answer incorrectly, take a 3-sip penalty.

title: Speed Sipper
description: The player who answers last takes an extra 2 sips.

title: Correct Sip
description: Everyone who got it right sips once to celebrate.

title: Double Trouble
description: If two players answer wrong, each takes 2 sips.

title: Blind Guess
description: Players who answer without reading the question take 3 sips.

title: First Mistake
description: The first person who answers wrong takes a 4-sip penalty.

title: Fastest Correct
description: The fastest correct answer makes everyone else sip once.

title: Unanimous Sip
description: If everyone answers correctly, everyone takes a sip.

title: Triangle Trouble
description: Players who answer the same as the host take 2 sips.

title: Jump The Gun
description: Players who answer before the question ends take 2 sips.

title: Half Right
description: Players who change their answer take 1 sip.

title: Silent Sipper
description: Players must stay silent; speaking players take a sip.

title: Truth or Drink
description: Players who answer truthfully take 1 sip.

title: Round Robin
description: Players take turns sipping in order after a round.

title: Second Chance
description: Players who correct their answer take 2 sips.

title: Sip surreal
description: Players who answer absurdly take 1 sip.

title: Echo Sipper
description: Players who repeat others' answers take 1 sip.

title: Overthinker
description: Players who overanalyze take 2 sips.

title: Lone Wolf
description: Players in the minority take 3 sips.

title: Gracious Sip
description: Winners of the round take 1 sip.
